author: Staff Reporter
text: Cadres of Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam staged an agitation here on Friday in support of Kovilpillai Nagar and Thermal Nagar residents, who had been facing problems caused by frequent power cuts. Spearheading the agitation near Thermal Nagar here, N. Periyasamy, district secretary, DMK, said that normal life of residents had been badly affected for the past one month. P. Geetha Jeevan, former Minister, took part in the agitation.
title: Protest against power cut
